summary: This document is an email from Vahe Stepanian to Paul Morris and Amanda Kirby, summarizing the accounts related to Jeffrey Epstein that can and cannot be transferred. It discusses the efficiency of the ACAT process and suggests liquidating mutual fund holdings for easier account management.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian

persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is referenced as the account holder whose accounts are being discussed for transfer.

keyFacts: The email discusses the transfer of Jeffrey Epstein's accounts and suggests liquidating mutual fund holdings for efficiency.
Vahe Stepanian is part of the Markets Coverage Group at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc.
The email includes suggestions for isolating positions that cannot be transferred into separate accounts.
Attachments referenced in the email include an account summary spreadsheet and a Southern Trust statement.
The email is marked as confidential and for internal use only.
